roach myself on and off.  For one thing, to date, JUnit has relied on
speci=
ally-named or annotated methods to accomplish the goal of succinctly
associ=
ating a name with a block of code.  In Java 8, one can just do:

addTest("S=
ome test name", () -> {
   // some code here
})

might make sense to play with several different
approaches to testing Java =
8 before blessing one of them as the "official
JUnit approach".
